post:
Hello LowEndTalk Users

You are looking for additional peering partners, free ip-transit or to start with bgp?

**Then we have exactly the right offer for you**. With the following virtual server, you can connect with more than 275 peering partners. For only $5.11 per month (annually payment).

> **VPS 4IXP (1 CPU, 1 GB RAM, 10 GB HDD) CHF 5.00/mo ($5.11/mo) - [Order now](https://securebit.ch/order?id=o11)**
> 1 Core @ 2.27GHz
> 1 GB ECC RAM
> 10 GB SAS Storage
> 1 Gbps (Shared)
> 1 IPv4 Address
> 1 IPv6 Address
> Location: Zurich, Switzerland
> Free IP-Transit (IPv4 and IPv6 Full Table) with automatic Filter
> 1st NIC for Internet Access and IP-Transit
> 2nd NIC connected to the 4B42 Internet Exchange Point Peering LAN

If you do not have an ASN yet, get your own AS number today and you will get a free IPv6 /48 subnet in addition:
> **ASN (32bit) RIPE Region - only CHF 75.00/one.off ($79.92/one-off) - [Order now](https://securebit.ch/order?id=a11)**
> Free IPv6 Subnet /48
> 32bit ASN
> RIPE Region
> Webinterface (Cloud Manager)

If you need addtional IPv6 Prefixes [View Details](https://www.securebit.ch/internet/resources/ipv6):
> **IPv6 Subnet /44 - CHF 15.00/anually ($15.77/anually) - [Order now](https://www.securebit.ch/order?id=a27)**
> - Geolocation for Assigment
> - Geolocation for superordinate subnet (AU, DE, EU, LI, VA)
> - Assignet to your RIPE ORG Object
> - You can create Sub-Allocations, Routes and Domains (PTR)
> - Webinterface (Securebit Cloud Manager)

[View all Offers and more Details](https://www.securebit.ch/internet/resources/ipv6)

4b42 Internet Exchange Point (4IXP) is with 276 Members the preferred Internet Exchange in Switzerland and a preferred worldwide free Internet Exchange:
![](https://www.securebit.ch/uploads/5f156cdfa9165.png "")
[Source from bgp.he.net](https://bgp.he.net/report/exchanges)


You can find more Informations about Internet Resouces (ASN and IP-Prefixes) here:
https://www.securebit.ch/internet/resources
And about our Tunnel-Offers here:
https://www.securebit.ch/internet/tunnel


**Find out more about Securebit AG and our offers:**

 * [Legal informations](https://www.securebit.ch/about/legal)

 * [Privacy](https://www.securebit.ch/about/privacy)

 * [Technology](https://www.securebit.ch/about/technology)

 * [Internet Resources (ASN, IPv4 and IPv6)](https://www.securebit.ch/internet/resources)

 * [Virtual Servers](https://www.securebit.ch/server/virtual) (you can connect to multiple Internet Exchanges)
